channel.title: Cv on Polina Shopina
channel.description: Recent content in Cv on Polina Shopina

item.title: Autonomous Seed Interrogator
item.description: Built an autonomous seed-sorting device for a Vancouver-based start-up Insporos.

item.title: Treasure-Collecting Robot Competition
item.description: Built an autonomous differential‑drive robot built in a six‑week UBC ENPH 253 course. It uses IR, ultrasonic, and magnetic sensors with PID control to navigate an obstacle course and collect objects with a four‑DOF claw.

item.title: Virtual Autonomous Driving Robot Competition
item.description: Trained an agent in Gazebo to autonomously navigate a 3D obstacle course (imitation learning) and correctly read random license plates (CNN) while avoiding collisions.
